comments.created_time: December 19, 2022, 09:03:45 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 05:21:05 PM by Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on December 19, 2022, 09:03:25 PMhttps://easyupload.io/v6xdu5For logo please use the above image not the one on the website.Quote from: Royse777 on December 26, 2022, 04:51:36 PMQuote from: jayce on December 26, 2022, 04:03:53 PMHowever, I think it's better to hide the code until the winner is chosen, so no one will take and modify your code into his own design. Too many people lately took someone's work and claimed as their creations, then submitted it into some contest. Modifying isn't completely prohibited but the original works still have the highest value. Good luck mate!I haven't thought about plagiarism. It's a good point and in that case it will be better if the participants post the images for the ranks as your entry and PM me the codes with the link of your entry. This way we can prevent cheating.Forum username: Royse777Bech32 address: bc1xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxm2Signature set and avatar: QuoteImage of your avatarImage of your signature setPM me the signature code instead of posting it in public.Note: If you have a separate design for Legendary rank then add it too.It's an updated post:Quote from: Royse777 on December 26, 2022, 04:51:36 PMQuote from: jayce on December 26, 2022, 04:03:53 PMHowever, I think it's better to hide the code until the winner is chosen, so no one will take and modify your code into his own design. Too many people lately took someone's work and claimed as their creations, then submitted it into some contest. Modifying isn't completely prohibited but the original works still have the highest value. Good luck mate!I haven't thought about plagiarism. It's a good point and in that case it will be better if the participants post the images for the ranks as your entry and PM me the codes with the link of your entry. This way we can prevent cheating.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on December 19, 2022, 09:03:45 PMQuote from: Royse777 on December 19, 2022, 09:03:25 PMhttps://easyupload.io/v6xdu5For logo please use the above image not the one on the website.Sorry for some reason the resources file was deleted from file.io (updated it with a new url) and their website have their old logo.

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: That's really a great first submission, rat03gopoh! However, I think it's better to hide the code until the winner is chosen, so no one will take and modify your code into his own design. Too many people lately took someone's work and claimed as their creations, then submitted it into some contest. Modifying isn't completely prohibited but the original works still have the highest value. Good luck mate! Well, now I have to improve my design to match yours. Hopefully I can finish mine before the deadline.Quote from: Royse777 on December 26, 2022, 04:02:27 PMSorry for some reason the resources file was deleted from file.io (updated it with a new url) and their website have their old logo.Oh noted, I didn't really pay attention to the instruction which I was using the one on the website too. Recreating it now. Thanks for letting us know

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: jayce on December 26, 2022, 04:03:53 PMHowever, I think it's better to hide the code until the winner is chosen, so no one will take and modify your code into his own design. Too many people lately took someone's work and claimed as their creations, then submitted it into some contest. Modifying isn't completely prohibited but the original works still have the highest value. Good luck mate!I haven't thought about plagiarism. It's a good point and in that case it will be better if the participants post the images for the ranks as your entry and PM me the codes with the link of your entry. This way we can prevent cheating.

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: I have a proposal, I don't know if the community likes it or not.It's like, if we, the participants of the campaign are going to wear these signatures and avatars, may we be given the opportunity to vote for the best signature/avatar with the team of Sinbad, so to make it fair for all the participants?I don't think such voting system took place in terms of best signature and avatar set design till now, so why not give this a shot?

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: 2double0 on December 27, 2022, 01:31:17 PMI have a proposal, I don't know if the community likes it or not.It's like, if we, the participants of the campaign are going to wear these signatures and avatars, may we be given the opportunity to vote for the best signature/avatar with the team of Sinbad, so to make it fair for all the participants?It seems you misunderstood this, Sinbad already have a signature and avatar as stated above, so this is just a contest to showcase talent and not medium to choose best signature & avatar for it's campaign. But plans could change. Moreover, your suggestion about voting is not equally a bad idea. But for the fact that this is a single-handed contest organized alone by "Sinbad" team, they have the sole right to choose whoever they deem fit as winner of this contest base on reasons best known to them. (Including Sir Royse777)

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on December 27, 2022, 02:12:24 PMIt seems you misunderstood this, Sinbad already have a signature and avatar as stated above, so this is just a contest to showcase talent and not medium to choose best signature & avatar for it's campaign. But plans could change. Moreover, your suggestion about voting is not equally a bad idea. But for the fact that this is a single-handed contest organized alone by "Sinbad" team, they have the sole right to choose whoever they deem fit as winner of this contest base on reasons best known to them. (Including Sir Royse777)It looks like you didn't understand what I 'proposed' here.I proposed it on behalf of the participants who are already a part of their signature campaign, and if they allow us to vote for the best signature (I'm sure we will vote the one they will like), then not just the team but we will also be happy to showcase it. However, the final decision still remains in the hands of Sinbad team.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I edited entry sample post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5430222.msg61468191#msg61468191Please review it.We have around two days left.

comments.author: julerz12
comments.created_time: December 30, 2022, 12:56:03 PMLast edit: June 22, 2023, 03:29:24 PM by julerz12

comments.author: jayce
comments.created_time: December 30, 2022, 06:42:30 PMLast edit: May 17, 2023, 06:36:47 PM by jayce
comments.body: Forum username :  jayceBech32 address :  bc1qufnman2zme4ysvs02x6shw3et9ddp96wp3l8xxSignature DesignAvatars     I almost forgot to finish the design because I thought there are still few days left, but realized today is 30th already. Thanks to my friend sujonali1819 he did remind me about it. I choose the combination of green and black as the theme colors, and the sig illustrates how the coin mixer works, which the traceable coins (shown as silver coins) enters to the Sinbad logo, as the mixer, then produces the untraceable coins (gold ones) as the result. I don't put many clues about what project Sinbad is, so out of curiosity, people might click the banner and try to find out themselves.Thank you and good luck guys.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: jayce on December 30, 2022, 06:42:30 PMI almost forgot to finish the design because I thought there are still few days left, but realized today is 30th already. Thanks to my friend sujonali1819 he did remind me about it. But by the way, the contest is said to end tomorrow 31st December 2022, and not today as stated in this thread above. So you still have some time (24hours) to make a few retouch on your signature and avatar design, if you think it's not worth the taste you had in mind. However, I wish everybody the best of luck, as we await to see who finally emerge the winner of this contest. Happy New year in advance to you all.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Last day guys!I think I will quote the list of graphic designer on the forum. Looks like a lot of them missed.Quote from: tranthidung on July 16, 2022, 10:47:31 AMGraphic Designers List|Name|Rank|Service|ANN|Contact|Notes||jayce*|Legendary|Signature, Avatar, Logo, Banner|Here|PM|||xhomerx10*|Legendary|Hat Avatar in Wall Observer|N/A|PM|Free service||madnessteat*|Legendary|Hat Avatar|N/A|PM|Free service||Zwei*|Sr. Member|Signature|Here|PM|||Meddzs*|Full Member|Websites, ANNs, WPs, Banners, infographics|Here|PM|||icalical*|Full Member|Telegram Sticker, ANN, Signature, Banners, Animation|Here|PM|||payjoe93*|Sr. Member|Telegram Animated Stickers|Here|PM|||Baoo*|Member|Web Design & DEV, NFT, Banners, Stickers, ANN's, 3D, Videos|Here|PM|||Heisenberg_Hunter*|Legendary|Signature, ANN, Avatar|Here|PM|||Maus0728*|Legendary|Drawings|Here|PM|||bubbalex*|Sr. Member|Animated stickers, Illustration, Banner, NFT, Roadmap, Logo|Here|PM|||TheLead123*|Newbie|Website, Logo, Banner|Here|PM|||mosdesign*|Jr. Member|Website, Logo, Banner|Here|PM|||Necromancy*|Newbie|ANN thread, Logo, Banner, Animation|Here|PM|||m4urow*|Newbie|Web design, graphic design, branding & identity|Here|PM|||roslinpl*|Legendary|Signature, Logo, Banner, video clip|Here|PM|Changed hands ?||NAVI12*|Member|Signature, ANN|Here|PM||

comments.author: hahay
comments.body: Forum username: hahayBech32 address: bc1qr4s00w7fm4h3rxewqqq48p9n3rv9v42r80ga5qSignature set and avatar:I just found out about this contest about eight hours ago, and immediately I made it, and the result is just like this.Happy New Year and good luck to all.Best regards

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: I am locking the thread. A winner will be announced soon. Thanks for your entries.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: We have our winner. Read details: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433002.msg61576671#msg61576671
